You've now covered the main features of Quarto for authoring a manuscript. You'll edit `{{< meta tool.article-file >}}`, add resources like figures, notebooks or bibliographic data, and preview the result with `quarto preview`.

Once, you are happy with the changes you've made, you'll need update your public manuscript webpage.

Head on to [Publishing](../publishing.qmd) to learn how to get your manuscript to the world.
